resources.string: Internet could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the internet is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when internet access has been disabled).
This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime.\nClick the button below to request the internet permission and open a full-screen internet preview.

This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime. Click the button to request the internet permission and open a full-screen internet preview. Note: The "RuntimePermissions" sample provides a more complete overview over the runtime permission features available.
internet access is required to display the internet preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting internet permission.
internet permission is available. Starting preview.
internet permission was granted. Starting preview.
